name: Spooky ScooPvP
description:
A small Dead by Daylight and Identity V inspired asymmetrical game for 4 players. 3 players will play as Survivors and try to escape, and 1 player will play as the Killer and attempt to kill all the Survivors.

The game features 9 playable Survivors and 7 playable Killers, all with their own unique abilities and strengths, as well as 3 maps.

Online multiplayer of the game is made possible through use of Parsec, an external software that allows same-keyboard local multiplayer games like this one playable online with friends. Parsec can be downloaded here:  https://parsecgaming.com/

More information about the game, how to play, and what the characters do can be found here: https://pastebin.com/1UMVpW20
